alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains; Idaho Palouse; Lewiston Area (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 11 at 12:38PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT SOUTHEASTERN LATAH... NORTHWESTERN NEZ PERCE AND SOUTHEASTERN WHITMAN COUNTIES... At 1136 AM PST, an area of moderate to heavy snow showers was located near the Pullman and Moscow areas and moving east at 30 MPH. Winds in excess of 30 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow along with drifting snow. Locations impacted include... Pullman, Moscow, Troy, Deary, Bovill, Colton, Uniontown, Helmer, and Joel. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 95 in Idaho between mile markers 332 and 348. U.S. Highway 195 in Washington between mile markers 5 and 22. Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a half mile in this area of heavy snow. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling. &&

area.areaDesc: Central Panhandle Mountains; Idaho Palouse; Lewiston Area
